Part I : Sec. (I) - GAZETTE  EXTRAORDINARY  OF  THE  DEMOCRATIC  SOCIALIST  REPUBLIC OF  SRI  LANKA - 14.09.2022
1A
w;s úfYI
wxl 2297$47 - 2022 iema;eïn¾ ui 14 jeks nodod - 2022'09'14
No.  2297/47  - WedNesdAy, september 14,   2022
EXTRAORDINARY
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART I : SECTION (I) — GENERAL
Government  Notifications
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
ThE FOREST CONSERvATION ACT
the order under section 3 of the forest conservation ordinance (Chpter 451), as Act, no. 13 of 1966 (reprint), as amended 
by acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009.
Order
by virtue of powers vested in me by section 3 of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as  Act.  
No. 13 of 1966 (reprint), As amended by Acts. No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and  
No. 65 of 2009, I Amaraweera mahinda, minister of  Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation do by this order declare the 
Galwala yaya Forest of 4190.28 hectares bounded by the limits set forth in the schedule hereto as Galwala yaya Reserved 
Forest from 06th day of september, 2022.
 
     
 
AmArAweerA mAhindA,
 minister of Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation.
ministry of Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation,
rajagiriya,
06th day of september, 2022.
1A- pG 5971  — 81 (09/2022)

I fldgi ( ^I& fPoh - YS% ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha w;s úfYI .eiÜ m;%h - 2022'09'14
Part I : Sec. (I) - GAZETTE  EXTRAORDINARY  OF  THE  DEMOCRATIC  SOCIALIST  REPUBLIC OF  SRI  LANKA - 14.09.2022
2A
Schedule
the state land of 4190.28 ha. located within mahaooya divisional secretary’s division and padiyathalawa divisional 
secretary’s division  of Ampara district in the eastern province of sri Lanka located within the area depicted by the following 
geodesic coordinates (survey method - Geodesic coordinates epsG : 5234 method).

From the starting coordinate (E 262917, N. 242242) to the final co - ordinates (E 266682, N. 248845) and from there to the 
starting point (e. 262917, N. 242242) in straight lines.
extent - 4190.28 ha.
eOG 09-0141/1

chedule (Contd.)

<!-- page 5 -->

I fldgi ( ^I& fPoh - YS% ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha w;s úfYI .eiÜ m;%h - 2022'09'14
Part I : Sec. (I) - GAZETTE  EXTRAORDINARY  OF  THE  DEMOCRATIC  SOCIALIST  REPUBLIC OF  SRI  LANKA - 14.09.2022
5A
PrinTed AT The dePArTmenT OF GOVernmenT PrinTinG,  Sri LAnKA.
FOREST CONSERvATION ORDINANCE
Notification
by virtue of powers vested in me by section 3 of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as  Act. No. 13 of 1966 
(reprint), as amended by Acts. No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009, I do 
by this notification notify that the the Galwala yaya Reserved Forest mentioned in the above order is subjected to the sole 
control of the Conservator General of Forests.
 
     
 
AmArAweerA mAhindA,
 minister of Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation.
ministry of Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation,
rajagiriya,
06th day of september, 2022.
eOG 09-0141/2
